mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_restaurant ( restNm, addr, lat, lng, tel ) VALUES ( #{restNm}, #{addr}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{tel} )

INSERT INTO t_restaurant_menu_info ( restPk, menuNm, menuPrice ) VALUES
( #{item.restPk}, #{item.menuNm}, #{item.menuPrice} )

INSERT INTO t_restaurant_menu_img ( restPk, img ) VALUES
( #{item.restPk}, #{item.img} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_restaurant ORDER BY restPk DESC
